      AnimalPhotoView​(java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle> list)
      Constructor for the AnimalPhotoView Creates a root Group Creates 6 animals consisting of Rectangles and ImagePatterns and adds them to the root Creates a Home button in the top left corner and adds it to the root Creates a Cavnas and adds it to the root Creates 6 Alerts and Creates event handlers for each of the 6 animals
